title: Mages NEED A NERF
body:
stop using adcs as an argument
the retardness of a class does not exclude the retardness of an other

mages have been overpowered for a year now, literally the only class that is viable in the mid lane and riot tried to buff zed a billion of time without any success of bringing him back except making him more aids to play because now you need to hit all of your shurikens to do damage

Remember about the thread complaining about mid lane being boring to play?
how faker can't do anything?
how faker can't play zed and make  plays?

now riot makes mid lane less boring, less braindead, more skilled to play
and people kneejerk massively

Just because adcs need a nerf(which will happen) does not mean mages are fine
does not mean it's fine for mages to back buy a single cheap mana item and no longer have a ressource **WHEN THEY WERE DESIGNED TO BE LIMITED**

hey remember this thing called mana? remember how spell casters are balanced around being limited? remember how this works IN EVERY SINGLE GAME?
remember how lucian was never going oom so riot nerfed his Q mana cost which left him in the gutter since a year now?

but really
really the best part is when the boards cry about powercreeping, but as soon as riot starts to nerf the big classes that dominate the game (adcs and mages) the boards randomly start to QQ massively
create a hundred of threads per hours and upvote them like sheeps

i tell you axe, go through with the changes, make the game more diverse, give weaknesses to champions
if the nerfs are harsh then you can go back a bit but for now please nerf mages with adcs

and then tanks

YES HE IS, a champ can have 45% winrate and be OP if it's a hard to use champ, old LB had moments when she had these winrates and she was one of the strongest champs in the game, same happened with Zoe that was (thanks god) nerfed besides having a bad winrate. And now Ryze or Azir are the strongest midlaners for ppl that are not apes and know how to use them, due to it you can see which winrates their mains reach and we should not give a fk about the guy that is learning how to play Azir loses a lot of games while he's learning because that's what high skill floors champs means.

Let me say it clear AZIR with 46% winrate is STRONGER than Janna at 54% winrate.

Give up, they see a champ with low winrate and without looking at the winrates that Azir players have they think he's weak.

 I thought the biggest crybabies on the Boards were the bruisers/juggernauts mains but it ended up being the mage mains by far, I was wrong there.

I am more than willing to accept arguments if they at least do the following:

A real attempt at a conversation
Lined with rational thought
Make compelling arguments

You OP are using derogatory language to try and make your argument sound strong, "the retardness of a class does not exclude the retardness of an other", what does that even mean?

You also didn't do your research and see why people are against the nerf. 

Mages right now are not performing any more differently then they have been for over a year, it's bot lane that has not only change but has had a major impact on the meta in doing so.

How do you think this change will go?

I'm of the opinion that it's a good idea to try and nerf the midlane strategy of endlessly waveclearing to essentially force an even lane while accelerating game pace with no-risk roaming. Compound that with bot lane nerfs and we have a healthier game.

I love the direction theyre going with it but something needs to be done to address chapter vs tear because it seems like tear users will pull ahead of chapter users even more with the new price changes making chapter 1300 and tear 850

Ah yes "Mages are the only class viable mid" right? Want to talk about how ADCs are the only class viable for Bot lane? No?

We mages are mad because of how they are nerfing the class, not really that they're nerfing the class...Then again, we already been getting nerfed a lot and the amount of AP we lost over the past few seasons is insane. In fact, now AD items are almost as strong as AP items which is sad.

This infinite mana problem that Riot and others are complaining about really started when Archangel went to 1400 max mana. Honestly they should just remove the 400 mana off of Archangel that they added, and maybe give it back 15-20 AP...then don't bother with this stupid base mana/level nerf. 

Because it's sad if this mana gutting goes through because then everyone would have more mana than Mages do at level 18...Even ADCs and tanks would have around 200-300 more mana than the average mage would...

OR better yet, they could just give a small nerf to the mages who are the worst offenders and not gutt an entire class for a select few. Yes I know that might also include {{champion:34}} and she is my main, but I can probably learn and adapt with her...but what I'm really worried about would be what happens to {{champion:161}} {{champion:115}} which are my other mid laners who are already doing poorly right now...this will put them in the gutter even more.

I think the change would have been a lot better received if they did this change AFTER nerfing adcs, but to everyone here it looks like they're just giving bot lane a pass and hammering mages instead.
Mrs Sona, don't you think Supports need nerf too?

the support nerfs are comming along the changes to adcs

at least this was said by repertoir/meddler
